[Groovy] Class GrailsProjectCompiler

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.GrailsProjectCompiler

class GrailsProjectCompiler
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates the compilation logic required for a Grails application.

Graeme Rocher
Since:
